statements: SELECT * FROM staff_schedule
SELECT staff_name, shift_date, assignment FROM staff_schedule WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM staff_schedule WHERE shift_date >= '2023-01-15'
SELECT staff_name, shift_time FROM staff_schedule WHERE assignment = 'Manager' ORDER BY shift_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT assignment FROM staff_schedule
SELECT * FROM staff_schedule WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shift_date DESC, shift_time ASC, staff_name;
SELECT staff_name, shift_date, shift_time FROM staff_schedule WHERE assignment = 'Manager' ORDER BY shift_date ASC, shift_time ASC;
SELECT staff_name, assignment, COUNT(*) AS shift_count FROM staff_schedule GROUP BY staff_name, assignment HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY shift_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT staff_name FROM staff_schedule WHERE assignment IN ('Cashier', 'Server') ORDER BY staff_name ASC;
SELECT shift_date, COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM staff_schedule GROUP BY shift_date ORDER BY total_shifts DESC, shift_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM staff_shifts WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT shift_date, start_time FROM staff_shifts WHERE shift_id = 3;
SELECT assignment_date, task_description FROM staff_assignments;
SELECT staff_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM staff_shifts WHERE shift_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assignment_id, staff_id, assignment_date FROM staff_assignments WHERE staff_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM staff_shifts WHERE shift_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT shift_id, staff_id, shift_date FROM staff_shifts WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT staff_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM staff_shifts WHERE staff_id = 123 AND shift_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT staff_id, assignment_date, task_description FROM staff_assignments WHERE staff_id IN (456, 789) ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, task_description FROM staff_assignments WHERE task_description LIKE '%project%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM staff_shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT staff_id, start_time, end_time FROM staff_shifts ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT staff_id, assignment_date, task_description FROM staff_assignments WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT staff_id, available_date FROM staff_availability WHERE is_available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM staff_shifts INNER JOIN staff_assignments ON staff_shifts.staff_id = staff_assignments.staff_id;
SELECT * FROM staff_shifts WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT shift_id, start_time, end_time FROM staff_shifts WHERE shift_date = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM staff_assignments WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-07-01' AND assignment_date <= '2022-07-31';
SELECT staff_id, COUNT(availability_id) AS availability_count FROM staff_availability GROUP BY staff_id;
SELECT sa.staff_id, sa.assignment_date, ss.shift_date FROM staff_assignments sa INNER JOIN staff_shifts ss ON sa.staff_id = ss.staff_id;
SELECT * FROM staff_shifts;
SELECT staff_id, shift_date, start_time, end_time FROM staff_shifts WHERE staff_id = 1;
SELECT location, department FROM staff_assignments WHERE staff_id = 2;
SELECT staff_id, first_name, last_name FROM staff WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM locations WHERE manager_id = 3;
SELECT s.staff_id, s.first_name, s.last_name, sa.location FROM staff s JOIN staff_assignments sa ON s.staff_id = sa.staff_id WHERE sa.department = 'HR';
SELECT ss.shift_id, ss.shift_date, ss.start_time, ss.end_time, s.first_name, s.last_name FROM staff_shifts ss JOIN staff s ON ss.staff_id = s.staff_id WHERE ss.shift_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT l.location_id, l.location_name, l.location_address, s.first_name, s.last_name FROM locations l JOIN staff s ON l.manager_id = s.staff_id WHERE l.location_id = 1;
SELECT s.staff_id, CONCAT(s.first_name, ' ', s.last_name) AS full_name, sa.department FROM staff s JOIN staff_assignments sa ON s.staff_id = sa.staff_id WHERE sa.location = 'Headquarters';

SELECT ss.shift_id, l.location_name, l.location_address, s.first_name, s.last_name FROM staff_shifts ss JOIN staff s ON ss.staff_id = s.staff_id JOIN locations l ON s.staff_id = l.manager_id ORDER BY ss.shift_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM staff;
SELECT staff_name FROM staff ORDER BY staff_name DESC;
SELECT staff_name, position, hourly_rate FROM staff WHERE hourly_rate > 20;
SELECT * FROM shift WHERE location = 'Main Office' ORDER BY shift_date ASC;
SELECT staff.staff_name, department.dept_name FROM staff JOIN dept_staff ON staff.staff_id = dept_staff.staff_id JOIN department ON dept_staff.dept_id = department.dept_id;
SELECT staff_name, position, hourly_rate FROM staff ORDER BY position DESC
SELECT shift_date, location FROM shift WHERE location = 'Main Office' ORDER BY shift_date ASC
SELECT staff.staff_name, shift.location FROM staff JOIN assignment ON staff.staff_id = assignment.staff_id JOIN shift ON assignment.shift_id = shift.shift_id
SELECT dept_name, staff_name FROM department JOIN dept_staff ON department.dept_id = dept_staff.dept_id JOIN staff ON dept_staff.staff_id = staff.staff_id
SELECT * FROM assignment WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND assignment_date <= '2022-02-28'
